Subscription.Description: Records creation and modification of accounts and groups
Subscription.Query: <QueryList> <!-- Bring in all account and group creation, modification and deletion events. It excludes account lockouts/unlocks which are captured by a different category --> <Query Id="0" Path="Security"> <Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID>=4720 and EventID<=4764 and EventID!=4740 and EventID!=4739)]]</Select> </Query> </QueryList>
